srcDoc.html:
\ asip consent

By signing, you certify the following information:

  • You have willingly provided true and accurate information in your ASIP Application for the purpose of requesting assistance from ASIP.

  • You have provided all information in this application, and all information furnished in support of this application, for the purpose of obtaining funding from ASIP to help Afghan new arrivals who are eligible for rental assistance under approved RPB and ORR eligibility criteria.

  • You certify that the application information provided is true and complete to the best of your knowledge.

By signing, you consent to the following terms:

  • The organization will complete the ASIP application on your behalf and share all personal information contained within the application with the Catholic Charities Diocese of San Diego (CCDSD), as well as the California Department of Social Services, the Office of Refugee Resettlement, or any other government agency as needed, for the purposes of processing your application.

  • The organization will make requests on your behalf to support your housing needs, including but not limited to the location where you will be permanently housed, and the rent amount.

  • If there are any changes to your approved ASIP plan, you will immediately contact CCDSD within three business days.

  • CCDSD will contact you each month to confirm that you are still residing in the rental location in your ASIP application. It is imperative that you respond to CCDSD. If CCDSD cannot confirm that you are residing in this location, or you change locations without notifying CCDSD, subsequent payments may be terminated upon CCDSD's determination.

  • You will remit the lease or sublease agreement within 3 business days of receipt of rent payment.

By signing, you indicate that you understand the following about the information you provide and its uses:

  • I understand that Title 18, Section 1001 of the U.S. Code states that a person is guilty of a felony for knowingly and willingly making a false or fraudulent statement to any department of the United States Government or subgrantees.

  • I understand that all information and documents provided, except as exempted pursuant to law, are a matter of public record, and I agree to provide any documentation needed to assist in determining eligibility.

  • I understand that if benefits received following receipt of ASIP funds are a duplication of benefits received from other sources such as federal benefits or charitable donations, that any subsequent assistance received ASIP leads will be informed and the rent subsidy payment will discontinue.

  • I authorize the ASIP lead to contact the landlord/property manager, employer, agencies, utility providers, and other applicable individuals for information about my family or myself for the purpose of rental assistance. This authorization includes any exempt or confidential information and all agencies and individuals with whom I have worked or may work through referral by any agency.

  • I understand that this authorization is considered a release. The release of content includes but is not limited to all information, including any exempt or confidential information, regarding rental history, rental amount, landlord information, income, employment, or other information needed to determine eligibility and process request for rental or utility assistance.

  • I understand that if I received additional benefits (including charitable donations) following my receipt of ASIP funds, and those benefits are a duplication of the ASIP funds/benefits that I have already or will receive, that I will notify ASIP of the receipt of these benefits and that my rent subsidy payment will be discontinued or proportionally reduced.
